    • Method Detail

      • coerce

        public static <T> T coerce(java.lang.Class<T> toType,
           java.lang.Object value)
        Converts the given value to the given type, using heuristics. The supported types are: primitives, arrays, Number, String, Boolean, Character, Calendar, Date, Enum, Entity, Locale and Collection

      • coerceCollection

        public static <T> java.util.Collection<T> coerceCollection(java.lang.Class<T> elementType,
                                           java.lang.Class<? extends java.util.Collection> collectionType,
                                           java.lang.Object value)
        Converts an object to a collection of the given type, using the given element type
        Returns:
        The resulting collection - it may be empty, but never null

      • coerceCollection

        public static <T> java.util.Collection<T> coerceCollection(java.lang.Class<T> elementType,
                                           java.lang.Object value)
        Converts an object to a collection with the given element type.
        Returns:
        The resulting collection - it may be empty, but never null
